comment.author: 24975813@N00
comment._content: Hi, I'm an admin for a group called 52words, and we'd love to have this added to the group! We are a new group to flickr and hope you can join us. One word is announced every sunday--this week, the word is HOPE. This is an interesting photo for our group--because it is about a person and a place..very important to the mission of 52words--please feel free to submit this one or any of your choosing! Check us out!
